directions: Combine artichoke hearts, mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, lemon zest, red pepper flakes, salt, and black pepper in a food processor or blender; blend until smooth. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.
ingredients: 1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Artichoke Aioli
